name: trap master
description: Very nimble and quick. Able to disarm traps and set them up very quickly.

ability.name: trap grid
ability.description: The room is a 5x5 grid. Runs in a random direction, away from the party and places a trap on the tile he left. The trap deals 2W10 damage. Runs one tile after 5 ticks.

name: bomb lobber
description: Able to throw bombs very far and very accurately.

ability.name: trap grid
ability.description: The room is a 5x5 grid. Runs in a random direction, away from the party and places a trap on the tile he left. The trap deals 2W10 damage. Runs one tile after 5 ticks.

name: sister friede
description: Woman with scythe. Able to summon a giant scythe to attack enemies.
